post:
![AlphaVPS](https://alphavps.bg/img/logo2.png)  

**About us:**
[AlphaVPS](https://alphavps.bg) is an IaaS provider, offering Virtual servers, Dedicated Servers, Connectivity and custom solutions out of 5 world-wide locations. Operating since 2013 and based out of Bulgaria. Our offices are located in Troyan and Sofia. We are staffed around the clock and our team is fully in-house with zero outsourcing. We run our network under AS203380, own our hardware and our Sofia office is located inside the Telepoint DataCenter in our flagship Sofia location, just above our equipment. Our company name is DA International Group Ltd. and we are an EU VAT-registered company.  

**About our current offerings:**  
- All prices are VAT Excl.  
- Regular TOS and AUP applies  
- Refunds are possible with genuine reason, within 3 days of the order  
- At the time of posting, the USD to EUR exchange rate is: 1.12USD per 1EUR  
- Dedicated server deployment is between an hour and 5 business days  

<br>
**OpenVZ (BG, DE, UK, NY, LA):**  
_Our OpenVZ offers are specifically designed and are stackable - in terms of the resources. This means that you can upgrade in the same increments, starting from the 4G plan:_
**2GB RAM - 15GB RAID10 SSD - 4x vCPU - 1TB Bandwidth - 3.5€/month or 35EUR/year -** [ORDER NOW](https://alphavps.bg/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=283)    
**4GB RAM - 30GB RAID10 SSD - 4x vCPU - 1TB Bandwidth - 5€/month -** [ORDER NOW](https://alphavps.bg/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=130)  
_Larger Packages on our website:_ [https://alphavps.bg](https://alphavps.bg/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=275)

<br>
**KVM (BG, UK)**  
_Our KVM offers are also stackable with base package:_  
**2GB RAM - 15GB RAID10 SSD - 4x vCPU - 1TB Bandwidth - 5€/month -** [ORDER NOW](https://alphavps.bg/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=162)  
_Larger Packages on our website:_ [https://alphavps.bg](https://alphavps.bg/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=275)

<br>
**Storage KVM (BG):**  
_Our Storage KVM plans are specifically designed as high storage products, based on huge RAID-60/RAID-10 arrays._  

**512MB RAM - 128GB HDD - 1x vCPU - 0.5TB Bandwidth - 15€/year -** [ORDER NOW](https://alphavps.bg/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=246)  
**768MB RAM - 256GB HDD - 1x vCPU - 1TB Bandwidth - 25€/year -** [ORDER NOW](https://alphavps.bg/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=245)  
**1GB RAM - 512GB HDD - 2x vCPU - 1.5TB Bandwidth - 3.5€/month -** [ORDER NOW](https://alphavps.bg/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=244)  
**2GB RAM - 1TB HDD - 2x vCPU - 3TB Bandwidth - 5€/month -** [ORDER NOW](https://alphavps.bg/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=243)  

   
<br>
**Dedicated Servers:**

Located in either Telepoint-East or Telepoint-West datacenters in Sofia, Bulgaria. Come with /29 of IPv4 and /64 of IPv6. Fully upgradeable and customisable.  

**Intel Xeon E3-1220v5 - 16GB DDR4 ECC - 240GB SSD - 10TB BW - 65.00€/month** [ORDER NOW](https://alphavps.bg/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=278)

**Looking glass:**  
- Sofia, Bulgaria @ Telepoint DC - http://lgbg.alphavps.bg - Native IPv6 available
